spirit:component.spirit:name: xaui_0

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: dclk_port
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Clock - free running clock uses to clock DRP and some logic.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: clk156_out_port
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: 156.25MHz output clock. Can be used to drive logic, but not another XAUI instance.

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include Shared Logic in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx 10 Gigabit Attachment Unit Interface (XAUI) LogiCORE provides a 4-lane high speed serial interface, providing up to 10 Gigabits per second (Gbps) total throughput when operating at an internal clock speed of 156.25 MHz, or up to 20Gbps when operating at an internal clock speed of 312.5MHz. The core includes the XGMII Extender Sublayers (DTE and PHY XGXS), and the 10GBASE-X sublayer, as described in clauses 47 and 48 of IEEE 802.3-2008. The core supports an optional serial MDIO management interface for accessing the IEEE 802.3-2008 clause 45 management registers. The MDIO interface may be omitted to save slice logic, in which case a simplified management interface is provided via bit vectors. The core is designed to seamlessly interface with the 10 Gigabit Ethernet Media Access Controller (XGMAC) LogiCORE via the XGMII.
